column4: Help ---> I am using an eee pc 1005peb with the latest netbook remix. Like a total noob i installed gma500 chipset firmwares thinking it would improve my graphics (probably not needed). It downgraded all of my graphics and upon reboot I had to run it in low graphics mode. I tried to uninstall all the poulsbo packets in synaptic package manager but my graphics are still on low. Is there any way I can go back to my previous settings (def
anyone know how to uninstall installed packets and restore previous settings? pm me
